title: New: The Weeknd – Initiation
body: On Saturday **[The Weeknd](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/10287-new-the-weeknd-thursday/ "New: The Weeknd – Thursday")** dropped a new cut from what’s likely to be included in his ‘latest body of work’. Disappointingly it’s the usual affair; leering, seductive and in this case disarmingly primitive and lustful, it leaves a well-worn taste in the mouth and little else.
